name: Loan warrior
description:
The warrior, who was the commander of the top infantry in the Northern Territories,

They feel guilty about the killing and leave the forest.

To forget about past memories, gambling, drinking and big debt.

Losing causes a warrior to suffer from a debt-ridden loan shark every day.

 

One day, there is a rumor that the princess was kidnapped by the royal army.

Thus, the warrior spoke to the villagers and scattered on the streets.

You will see the king's recruiting order.

 

The recruiting order is to save the princess, marry the princess,

The message was that they would give gold and silver coins.

 

A warrior is not interested in marriage, but he gives gold and silver jewelry.

At the news, they enter the royal palace and take orders from the king and head to Maurus.

FIREEEEE !!!
